protectionindicator-explanation-cascadin:
Informational text show in a popup to users on clicking on a cascading edit protection icon. $1 represents the level of protection.
Message supports wikitext.

Informational text show in a popup to users on clicking on a cascading move protection icon. $1 represents the level of protection.
Message supports wikitext.
protectionindicator-explanation-normal-e:
Informational text show in a popup to users on clicking on a normal (non cascading and non flaggedrevs) edit protection icon. $1 represents the level of protection and $2 represents the time at which the protection expires.
Message supports wikitext.
protectionindicator-explanation-normal-m:
Informational text show in a popup to users on clicking on a normal (non cascading and non flaggedrevs) move protection icon. $1 represents the level of protection and $2 represents the time at which the protection expires.
Message supports wikitext.
protectionindicator-explanation-normal-c:
Informational text show in a popup to users on clicking on a normal (non cascading and non flaggedrevs) create protection icon. $1 represents the level of protection and $2 represents the time at which the protection expires.
Message supports wikitext.
protectionindicator-explanation-normal-u:
Informational text show in a popup to users on clicking on a normal (non cascading and non flaggedrevs) upload protection icon. $1 represents the level of protection and $2 represents the time at which the protection expires.
Message supports wikitext.
protectionindicator-explanation-normal-i:
Informational text show in a popup to users on clicking on a normal (non cascading and non flaggedrevs) edit protection icon on a page that has been protected with no expiry date. $1 represents the level of protection.
Message supports wikitext.

Informational text show in a popup to users on clicking on a normal (non cascading and non flaggedrevs) move protection icon on a page that has been protected with no expiry date. $1 represents the level of protection.
Message supports wikitext.

Informational text show in a popup to users on clicking on a normal (non cascading and non flaggedrevs) create protection icon on a page that has been protected with no expiry date. $1 represents the level of protection.
Message supports wikitext.

Informational text show in a popup to users on clicking on a normal (non cascading and non flaggedrevs) upload protection icon on a page that has been protected with no expiry date. $1 represents the level of protection.
Message supports wikitext.
protectionindicator-explanation-flaggedr:
Informational text show in a popup to users on clicking on a flaggedrevs protection icon. $1 represents the level of protection and $2 represents the time at which the protection expires.
Message supports wikitext.

Informational text show in a popup to users on clicking on a flaggedrevs protection icon on a page that has been protected with no expiry date. $1 represents the level of protection and $2 represents the time at which the protection expires.
Message supports wikitext.
